channel.title: Refresh - Original 317 Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://imgur.com/6ODwI.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imgur.com/ZUErO.png[/img] The objective for this server is to give old RuneScape players the 317 feeling and bring back memories and have fun at the same time. The main focus will be players, we (staff) will concentrate on what the players want with weekly polls on future content and if it isn't majority vote (85%+) then the suggested will not be added.
[IMG]http://imgur.com/zQ2tA.png[/img] The base for the actual server will be Armareon #317, which is a very nice base and is actually based off of Emulous, another excellent base. Some basic stuff is already added such as Barrows, PvM, PvP, and other basic features like item dropping. The base for the client will be a blank #317 deob client with very little features to keep this as original as possible.
[IMG]http://imgur.com/MmqsP.png[/img]
[ul][*]Oliver Klohzoff (Joseph) - Server + Client [*]Spot Currently Open - Server [*]Spot Currently Open - Client[/ul]
If you are interested in joining the development team, please PM me.
[IMG]http://imgur.com/rNOlD.png[/img]
[ul][*]Oliver Klohzoff (Joseph) [*].:Tanner:. [*]Creator of Emulous[/ul]
[URL=http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/projects/258946-refresh.html][IMG]http://imgur.com/VVu0o.png[/img][/URL] [code][*URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,453547.0.html][*IMG]http://imgur.com/VVu0o.png[/IMG][/URL][/code][/CENTER]
[LEFT][IMG]http://imgur.com/VI67E.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imgur.com/L2PVO.png[/img]

[COLOR=Lime][Y]Completely clean 317 cache[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime][Y]No items/objects/NPCs/animations/gfx added higher than #317[/COLOR]

All i can say is good job making a 317 server that doesn’t include and customs.

item.title: Refresh - Original 317 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

[CENTER]


The objective for this server is to give old RuneScape players the 317 feeling and bring back memories and have fun at the same time. The main focus will be players, we (staff) will concentrate on what the players want with weekly polls on future content and if it isn’t majority vote (85%+) then the suggested will not be added.


The base for the actual server will be Armareon #317, which is a very nice base and is actually based off of Emulous, another excellent base. Some basic stuff is already added such as Barrows, PvM, PvP, and other basic features like item dropping. The base for the client will be a blank #317 deob client with very little features to keep this as original as possible.
